item.title: 概率论 贝叶斯公式及蒙提霍尔悖论
item.description: 贝叶斯公式 蒙提霍尔问题 描述 The Monty Hall Problem. This is a much discussed puzzle, based on an old American game show. You are told that a prize is equally likely to be found behind any one of three closed doors in front of you. You point to one of the doors. A friend opens for you one of the remaining two doors, after making sure that the prize is not behind it.
